post.author: 이진경
post.content:
GTA-Senior Programmer - PeopleSoft

  Accenture is the world's leading provider of management and technology consulting services and solutions. Here you'll have the opportunity to develop a rewarding career, working in a collaborative, energetic and diverse environment.

A Senior Programmer will design and code medium to high complexity software objects and repair applications to keep them performing in accordance with technical and functional specifications. In addition, a Senior Programmer will execute and document tests necessary to ensure that an application or technical environment meets performance requirements.

A Senior Programmer will document and assist in defining the functional and technical requirements of the application and support configuration changes to packaged software applications to meet business process requirements.

Qualifications

More than 1 year of PeopleSoft application programm마의and development experience

Experience with PeopleCode, Application Engine

Significant experience with 3GL programming (SQR)

Strong testing, configuration and deployment experience

Strong oral and written communication skills

Strong teamwork skills

Location

Toronto (Mississauga), ON

We are committed to employment equity. We encourage all people, including women, visible minorities, persons with disabilities and persons of aboriginal descent to apply.




Apply DIRECTLY to our website referencing job code 02I-MONP76:


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: 02I-MONP76
post.title: GTA-Senior Programmer - PeopleSoft
